name: Systemd Journal Service
description: Ensures the systemd-journald logging service is active and healthy.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active systemd-journald 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^active$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Restarting journald...'; systemctl restart systemd-journald 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 2; if systemctl is-active systemd-journald 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^active$'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
